intro: Cyclostemon natalensis, commonly known as Natal cyclostemon, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Proteaceae and is characterized by its distinctive, showy inflorescences. The plant produces yellow to orange flowers that are arranged in a cylindrical cluster, making it visually striking. It thrives in well-drained soils and requires full sun to partial shade for optimal growth. Due to its ornamental value, it is often cultivated in gardens and botanical collections.
